review.reviewBody: Pasta was good. I was a bit disappointed in the Caesar salad I didn realize it had bacon on it just FYI for any one ordering.
Cheesy Garlic Fries were pathetic as if they gave boiled potatoes dipped in so much of garlic that I really have to brush my teeth 5 times to get rid of the foul smell..

They substituted my order without informing me, and changed the entire order because they were out of stock. They gave me meat lasagna instead even though I ordered a vegetarian, and would not let me modify or cancel
